title: Mini-Ep 179: What's in a Name?
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 179: What's in a Name?
itunes:subtitle: Kate takes up jewelry making and Doree’s meal kit procrastination becomes meal prep. Then, they discuss Doree’s first name, big career changes, and a listener’s approach to self-care after an abrupt break-up. Activity of the week: Spice up ...
description:
Kate takes up jewelry making and Doree’s meal kit procrastination becomes meal prep. Then, they discuss Doree’s first name, big career changes, and a listener’s approach to self-care after an abrupt break-up. 


Activity of the week: Spice up your routine. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
